title: Ashley Hart loved-up as ever as she confirms new relationship with American entrepreneur Brett Leve
text:
Ashley Hart has confirmed her new romance American ski lodge entrepreneur Brett Leve, two years after splitting from her husband Buck Palmer.

Taking to Instagram on Saturday, the 30-year-old Australian model finally put the swirling rumours to rest by sharing a series of romantic snaps with her partner, 35, at a luxury Utah resort.

'The hills are alive with the sound of infinite possibility, community, abundant creativity and true beauty,' she captioned her post, making sure to tag Brett alongside a love heart and butterfly emoji.

'My favourite arms to be held in': Ashley Hart, 30, (left) has CONFIRMED her new relationship with ski lodge entrepreneur Brett Leve, 35 (right)

Brett penned a sweet comment underneath the professional images, which showed them dancing and giggling together atop a grassy mountain.

Always whipping something in your ear to make u laugh,' he wrote.

Ashley replied: 'Endlessly [laughing emoji]. 'Can you just be serious for a second' hahaha'.

It's official! Ashley and Brett also exchanged a series of amorous comments on Instagram beneath their respective posts on Saturday

Meanwhile, the blonde's friends and online followers flooded the post with congratulatory comments, including her model sister Jessica who wrote: 'These are everything'.

Meanwhile, Brett shared the same photos to his Instagram page on Saturday, alongside the caption: 'My favourite person in my favourite place', while tagging Ashley.

In a comment beneath his post, Ashley cooed: 'My favourite arms and place to be held in'.

Hinting at romance: Ashley and Brett hinted at their relationship back in May when Ashley shard a photo of the couple holding hands while in Cancún, Mexico (pictured)

In with the new! Ashley's new romance comes two years after she split from her husband Buck Palmer

Ashley and Brett hinted at their relationship back in May when Ashley shard a photo of the couple holding hands while in Cancún, Mexico.

Her beau, who is based in Eden, Utah, spends his time building ski resorts in the US.

He is also the co-founder of Summit, a New York based company that designs experiences that connect and inspire a community of today's brightest leaders.

Living the high life! Brett (pictured) is the co-founder of Summit, a New York based company that designs experiences that connect and inspire a community of today's brightest leaders

Ashley's new relationship comes two years after she called time on her marriage to Buck Palmer.

The couple had had dated for seven years and married in Los Angeles back in 2015, before announcing their shock split two years later.

Interestingly, the pair announced their breakup by appearing in bohemian photo shoot that showed them dancing on a hilltop- a concept strikingly similar to that of the photos Ashley posted of herself and Brett.

That looks familiar! Ashley and Buck (pictured) announced their breakup by appearing in bohemian photo shoot that showed them dancing on a hilltop- a concept strikingly similar to that of the photos Ashley posted of herself and Brett

In the caption, she penned an emotional poem about her ex, writing in part: 'Forever infinitely dancing, like us now, on this hill top.'

Earlier this year Ashley spoke about her breakup with Buck, and claimed the 'hard times' and heartache she experienced have helped to now shape her as a person.

'I [didn’t] think that would be my life – having that experience before 30,' she told Women's Health Magazine in May.

'Relationships are so often a mirror - when they're tough, I think that's some of the best material for self-growth,' Ashley said.
description: Ashley Hart has confirmed her new romance American ski lodge entrepreneur Brett Leve, two years after splitting from her husband Buck Palmer.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
